column3: News;Siem Reap: A British* man died of cancer in Treang Village
column5: Siem Reap Town Siem Reap at 08:30 AM on February 8
column11: arrived in Cambodia in June 2018 at the Siem Reap International Airport.------ According to the examination of Dr. Cheat Chhon
column12: the man died of cancer. The body was transferred to the Khmer Soviet Friendship Hospital in Phnom Penh
column13: waiting for the family to come.------*Later sources report him being Australian
column14: since found to be mistaken.------WARNING- graphic images of deceased in ------source------*WARNING- graphic images in second ------source
